caption: In the dark night, a man and a woman crawl among the rocks. They take out a rope and start climbing upwards. They reach a high-tech spaceship. The man sits in the driver's seat, and the woman follows closely. When the man looks back, he realizes the woman is missing. She's outside, and the man follows her. The woman pushes the man, and shooting stars appear in the sky. The man shows a photo to the woman, who lies on a haystack looking very sad. In the end, they embrace tightly. The man and the woman finally return to the spaceship. Something strikes the spaceship violently, causing an explosion.
